Replace.Text: May prosperity come to your cities—the ones away from the coast.
We have no interest in the land-that is for you to claim-but the seas and the shores are Phoenician
I am told you have placed great cities near our common border, like a garden of splendid roses. Delightful!
If you are going to trouble yourself to make cities near our border, at least make them beautiful, prosperous cities, so I may enjoy the view.
I am told you have placed great cities near our common border, like a garden of splendid roses. Delightful!
If you are going to trouble yourself to make cities near our border, at least make them beautiful, prosperous cities, so I may enjoy the view.
I’ve just acquired a new work and will host a viewing soon. Your emissaries are invited to attend.
I suppose you think art is great when it ties a room together, you philistine.
Your land stays green and your waters are clean and clear. Choice.
You pile filth on the land and dump it in the sea! You waste and spoil the world!
You have proved a reliable partner in resolving international conflict, Canada commends you.
Why do you not help resolve the crises that affect the world? Are you unmoved by the plight of others?
Rejoice with me, friend, for we are free from every want and can devote our time to the will of God.
What have you done, that God has withdrawn his bounty from you? See that you return to righteousness!
The quickest way to success is to levy the strengths of your little allies, wouldn’t you agree?
They say you pay your auxiliaries in patriotism. That and two pennies will buy them a beer.
You recognize that the Inca are the masters of the heights. This shows wisdom on your part.
The Inca are the masters of the mountains. Do not challenge me on this ground. Be content with the lowlands.
You, too, must possess the wisdom of Solomon, for your nation is made of many people who live in harmony.
If you would be master of the world, you must first be master of your people—and you show no signs of mastery in this matter.
It is better that you lack ambition to claim land, because I believe you lack the acumen to rule what you would take.
How can you dare to claim such lands for yourself, when your people are weak and so badly led?
I am pleased you have chosen to remain a barbarian people, whose kingdom merely emphasizes my glory.
I am the Emperor of all under heaven. That means all lands, including those you seek to possess for yourself, are rightfully mine. Do not strive to equal me.
I agree with you—There are too many pressing problems on earth to be pinning our hopes on space.
How can you think about a future in space, when the present situation on earth should command your full attention!
Blessed is the one who leaves the heavens to the Gods, and does not aspire to walk among them.
Do not approach the sun god Amun-Ra, nor the sky goddess Nut! Your impiety offends them! You will bring about the ruin of the world!
Those of us with great navies can make our will felt across the world, and we are the true masters of the seas.
You must make an effort at building ships and projecting your power across the seas, or no nation will respect you.
So, you seek to challenge our supremacy at sea? Bully! I relish the competition!
Do you so readily concede competition in the arena of the seas? Why intentionally constrain your sovereignty? Are you afraid?
I am pleased that you are ready to accept me as the supreme leader of this planet. Already others whisper that my time is at hand.
I see through your honeyed words and your curried favors. You seek ultimate power for yourself, and you would have the nations give it to you of their own free will.
You will never know the joy of a responsive mob to a good speech, because you never practice the art of politics.
I’ll ostracize you for what you’re doing! Playing on emotions of the mob is my route to power!
We’ve started a tour package for your citizens who want a world-class vacation. Apparently, nothing like this exists in your civilization.
I know the world is beating a path to your tourist sites, but be warned! Our people possess blue jeans and rock music and are not afraid to use them.
Your people have a simple culture. It is amusing and somewhat tragic. You could learn from the rest of the world.
Vibrant and unique cultures are threatened by the rising tide of your popular culture.
How happy is the land whose ruler follows the one true religion, and protects the souls of his people!
Blasphemy and heresy spill from the lips of your subjects! You must restore your people’s souls by restoring the true religion!
You know that a good ruler leads the souls of his people on the right course, and in doing so brings the blessings of heaven to them.
I fear you have mistaken spreading religious infidelity for a lively carnival of ideas.
Maximal freedom can come only from civilizations pursuing their own interests, wouldn’t you say?
By what right do you impose your political agenda on my sovereign civilization? I do not consent to be ruled against my will.
I am pleased that you recognize these political gestures are mere games, devoid of true power and without respect for the right of rule.
Your attempts at creating this greater political union comes close to stealing the authority of my crown. I do not take kindly to those who do not respect this crown.
Your enemies know you by flame and fear. They pray to be delivered from your wrath, but the heavens are silent.
Your enemies make war on you, but you do not plunder their lands in retribution. Is it out of cowardice? Or an excess of politeness?
Good! You punish your enemies with fire and sword until they tremble at the sound of your name. Pity you were not born a Viking.
You lack the courage to punish your enemies, and you lack the fortitude to make their lands an ashen wasteland. Pathetic.
Good fences make good neighbors, and good defenses a peaceable kingdom. I am pleased you are content to protect your lands.
In your rush to war and conquest, you set events into motion whose course you cannot foresee. Better to stay home and protect, than go abroad and conquer.
Ambition for territory is the seed that ruins dynasties. I am pleased you seek only to defend your lands.
I perceive your conquests with concern, but not with fear. Know that if you invade Japan, the very wind and seas will come to our aid.
Even after all we have done, I still worry that there are some souls that do not want to be saved.
I intend to see the salvation of your soul, whether you want it or not!
It is good that you have chosen the right faith. You probably did so from admiration of me. That is understandable.
I am making a gift of my religion to you! Why do you not accept? You will shame yourself, and face destruction in the afterlife!
Your treasury is filling up quite nicely. It's always nice to have such strong income, isn't it?
Your empire is headed toward bankruptcy. How can you survive with debt piling up?
